```sql
/* -------------------------------------------------
   1. Tabelle: status
   ------------------------------------------------- */
CREATE TABLE status (
    id          INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name        TEXT    NOT NULL UNIQUE,               -- z.â€¯B. "Offen", "In Bearbeitung", "Erledigt"
    description TEXT
);

/* -------------------------------------------------
   2. Tabelle: todo_item
   ------------------------------------------------- */
CREATE TABLE todo_item (
    nr          INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,   -- eindeutige Nummer (NR)
    name        TEXT    NOT NULL,                     -- kurzer Titel
    description TEXT,                                 -- ausfÃ¼hrliche Beschreibung
    type        TEXT    NOT NULL
                     CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')), -- Unterscheidung Bug / Idee
    status_id   INTEGER NOT NULL,                     -- Verweis auf status.id
    created_at  DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
    updated_at  DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),

    CONSTRAINT fk_status
        FOREIGN KEY (status_id)
        REFERENCES status(id)
        ON UPDATE CASCADE
        ON DELETE RESTRICT
);

/* -------------------------------------------------
   3. Trigger: automatisches Pflegen von updated_at
   ------------------------------------------------- */
CREATE TRIGGER trg_todo_item_updated
AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
    UPDATE todo_item
       SET updated_at = datetime('now')
     WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
END;

/* -------------------------------------------------
   4. Indexe (hÃ¤ufige Abfragen)
   ------------------------------------------------- */
-- Suche nach allen offenen Bugs/Ideen
CREATE INDEX idx_todo_item_status_type
    ON todo_item (status_id, type);

-- Schnellere Auflistung nach Erstellungszeit
CREATE INDEX idx_todo_item_created
    ON todo_item (created_at);
```

### FILENAME: db.py
```python
"""
db.py â€“ SQLiteâ€‘Wrapper fÃ¼r die Todoâ€‘Listâ€‘Applikation

Stellt folgende Funktionen bereit:
* Datenbankâ€‘Initialisierung inkl. Schemaâ€‘Erstellung
* CRUDâ€‘Operationen fÃ¼r Todoâ€‘Items
* Hilfsfunktionen fÃ¼r Statusâ€‘Lookup
"""

import os
import sqlite3
from typing import List, Tuple, Dict, Any

DB_FILE = "todo.db"


class Database:
    """Einfacher SQLiteâ€‘Wrapper mit parametriÂ­sierÂ­ten Queries."""

    def __init__(self, db_path: str = DB_FILE):
        self.db_path = db_path
        self.conn = sqlite3.connect(self.db_path)
        self.conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
        self._ensure_schema()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Schema & Initialâ€‘Daten
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _ensure_schema(self) -> None:
        """Erstellt das komplette Schema, falls es noch nicht existiert."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()

        # 1. statusâ€‘Tabelle
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                description TEXT
            );
            """
        )

        # 2. todo_itemâ€‘Tabelle
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS todo_item (
                nr INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                name TEXT NOT NULL,
                description TEXT,
                type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')),
                status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id)
                    ON UPDATE CASCADE
                    ON DELETE RESTRICT
            );
            """
        )

        # 3. Trigger fÃ¼r updated_at
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS trg_todo_item_updated
            AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
            FOR EACH ROW
            BEGIN
                UPDATE todo_item
                SET updated_at = datetime('now')
                WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
            END;
            """
        )

        # 4. Indexe
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_status_type
            ON todo_item (status_id, type);
            """
        )
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_created
            ON todo_item (created_at);
            """
        )

        # 5. Initiale Statusâ€‘EintrÃ¤ge (nur einfÃ¼gen, wenn sie noch nicht existieren)
        cur.execute("SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM status;")
        if cur.fetchone()["cnt"] == 0:
            cur.executemany(
                "INSERT INTO status (name, description) VALUES (?, ?);",
                [
                    ("Offen", "Aufgabe wurde noch nicht bearbeitet"),
                    ("In Bearbeitung", "Arbeit lÃ¤uft gerade"),
                    ("Erledigt", "Aufgabe ist abgeschlossen"),
                ],
            )
        self.conn.commit()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Statusâ€‘Hilfsfunktionen
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def get_statuses(self) -> List[Tuple[int, str]]:
        """Liefert eine Liste von (id, name) fÃ¼r alle definierten Stati."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute("SELECT id, name FROM status ORDER BY id;")
        return [(row["id"], row["name"]) for row in cur.fetchall()]

    def get_status_id_by_name(self, name: str) -> int:
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute("SELECT id FROM status WHERE name = ?;", (name,))
        row = cur.fetchone()
        if row is None:
            raise ValueError(f"Status '{name}' existiert nicht.")
        return row["id"]

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Todoâ€‘Itemâ€‘Operationen
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def add_item(
        self,
        name: str,
        description: str,
        item_type: str,
        status_name: str = "Offen",
    ) -> int:
        """FÃ¼gt ein neues Todoâ€‘Item ein und gibt die erzeugte NR zurÃ¼ck."""
        status_id = self.get_status_id_by_name(status_name)
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            INSERT INTO todo_item (name, description, type, status_id)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
            """,
            (name, description, item_type, status_id),
        )
        self.conn.commit()
        return cur.lastrowid

    def get_all_items(self) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Liefert alle Todoâ€‘Items als Liste von Dictionaries."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            SELECT ti.nr, ti.name, ti.description, ti.type,
                   s.name AS status,
                   ti.created_at, ti.updated_at
            FROM todo_item ti
            JOIN status s ON ti.status_id = s.id
            ORDER BY ti.nr ASC;
            """
        )
        rows = cur.fetchall()
        return [dict(row) for row in rows]

    def update_item(
        self,
        nr: int,
        name: str,
        description: str,
        item_type: str,
        status_name: str,
    ) -> None:
        """Aktualisiert sÃ¤mtliche Felder eines bestehenden Items."""
        status_id = self.get_status_id_by_name(status_name)
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            UPDATE todo_item
            SET name = ?, description = ?, type = ?, status_id = ?
            WHERE nr = ?;
            """,
            (name, description, item_type, status_id, nr),
        )
        self.conn.commit()

    def delete_item(self, nr: int) -> None:
        """LÃ¶scht ein Todoâ€‘Item."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute("DELETE FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (nr,))
        self.conn.commit()

    def change_status(self, nr: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
        """Ã„ndert nur den Status eines Items."""
        status_id = self.get_status_id_by_name(new_status_name)
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            "UPDATE todo_item SET status_id = ? WHERE nr = ?;",
            (status_id, nr),
        )
        self.conn.commit()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  AufrÃ¤umen
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def close(self) -> None:
        self.conn.close()
```

### FILENAME: dialogs.py
```python
"""
dialogs.py â€“ Dialoge fÃ¼r das Anlegen / Bearbeiten von Todoâ€‘Items
"""

from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QDialog,
    QVBoxLayout,
    QFormLayout,
    QLineEdit,
    QTextEdit,
    QComboBox,
    QPushButton,
    QMessageBox,
)
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt

class AddEditDialog(QDialog):
    """
    Wiederverwendbarer Dialog zum Anlegen oder Bearbeiten eines Todoâ€‘Items.
    Der Dialog arbeitet im Modus 'add' bzw. 'edit' (je nach Ã¼bergebenem item).
    """

    def __init__(self, db, item=None, parent=None):
        """
        :param db: Instanz von db.Database
        :param item: Optionales Dict mit den Feldern eines bestehenden Items
        :param parent: Parentâ€‘Widget
        """
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.db = db
        self.item = item
        self.setWindowTitle("Eintrag hinzufÃ¼gen" if item is None else "Eintrag bearbeiten")
        self.setModal(True)
        self.setAttribute(Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose)

        self._build_ui()
        if self.item:
            self._populate_fields()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  UIâ€‘Aufbau
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _build_ui(self):
        layout = QVBoxLayout(self)

        form = QFormLayout()
        self.name_edit = QLineEdit()
        self.desc_edit = QTextEdit()
        self.type_combo = QComboBox()
        self.type_combo.addItems(["bug", "idee"])
        self.status_combo = QComboBox()
        self.status_combo.addItems([name for _, name in self.db.get_statuses()])

        form.addRow("Name:", self.name_edit)
        form.addRow("Beschreibung:", self.desc_edit)
        form.addRow("Typ:", self.type_combo)
        form.addRow("Status:", self.status_combo)

        layout.addLayout(form)

        # Buttons
        btn_layout = QVBoxLayout()
        self.save_btn = QPushButton("Speichern")
        self.cancel_btn = QPushButton("Abbrechen")
        self.save_btn.clicked.connect(self._on_save)
        self.cancel_btn.clicked.connect(self.reject)

        btn_layout.addWidget(self.save_btn)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.cancel_btn)
        layout.addLayout(btn_layout)

        # Stil â€“ leicht transparent fÃ¼r den Glassâ€‘Effekt
        self.setStyleSheet(
            """
            QDialog {
                background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);
                border-radius: 12px;
                padding: 15px;
            }
            QLineEdit, QTextEdit, QComboBox {
                background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
                border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
                border-radius: 6px;
                padding: 4px;
            }
            QPushButton {
                background-color: rgba(0, 120, 215, 0.7);
                color: white;
                border: none;
                border-radius: 6px;
                padding: 6px 12px;
            }
            QPushButton:hover {
                background-color: rgba(0, 120, 215, 0.9);
            }
            """
        )

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Daten fÃ¼llen (Editâ€‘Modus)
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _populate_fields(self):
        self.name_edit.setText(self.item["name"])
        self.desc_edit.setPlainText(self.item["description"] or "")
        self.type_combo.setCurrentText(self.item["type"])
        self.status_combo.setCurrentText(self.item["status"])

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Validierung & Speichern
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _on_save(self):
        name = self.name_edit.text().strip()
        description = self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip()
        item_type = self.type_combo.currentText()
        status = self.status_combo.currentText()

        if not name:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Eingabefehler", "Der Name darf nicht leer sein.")
            return

        try:
            if self.item is None:
                # Neu anlegen
                self.db.add_item(name, description, item_type, status)
            else:
                # Vorhandenes Item aktualisieren
                self.db.update_item(
                    self.item["nr"], name, description, item_type, status
                )
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Datenbankfehler", str(e))
            return

        self.accept()
```

```python
"""
db.py â€“ SQLiteâ€‘Wrapper fÃ¼r die Todoâ€‘Listâ€‘Applikation

Stellt Funktionen bereit fÃ¼r:
* Datenbankâ€‘Initialisierung inkl. Schemaâ€‘Erstellung
* CRUDâ€‘Operationen fÃ¼r Todoâ€‘Items
* Hilfsfunktionen fÃ¼r Statusâ€‘Lookup
"""

import os
import sqlite3
from typing import List, Tuple, Dict, Any

DEFAULT_DB = "todo.db"


class Database:
    """Einfacher SQLiteâ€‘Wrapper mit parametrisierten Queries."""

    def __init__(self, db_path: str = DEFAULT_DB):
        self.db_path = db_path
        # ``detect_types`` ermÃ¶glicht automatische Konvertierung von DATETIME
        self.conn = sqlite3.connect(self.db_path, detect_types=sqlite3.PARSE_DECLTYPES)
        self.conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
        self._ensure_schema()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Schema & Initialâ€‘Daten
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _ensure_schema(self) -> None:
        """Erstellt das komplette Schema, falls es noch nicht existiert."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()

        # 1. statusâ€‘Tabelle
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                description TEXT
            );
            """
        )

        # 2. todo_itemâ€‘Tabelle
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS todo_item (
                nr INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                name TEXT NOT NULL,
                description TEXT,
                type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')),
                status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id)
                    ON UPDATE CASCADE
                    ON DELETE RESTRICT
            );
            """
        )

        # 3. Trigger fÃ¼r updated_at
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS trg_todo_item_updated
            AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
            FOR EACH ROW
            BEGIN
                UPDATE todo_item
                SET updated_at = datetime('now')
                WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
            END;
            """
        )

        # 4. Indexe
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_status_type
            ON todo_item (status_id, type);
            """
        )
        cur.execute(
            """
            CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_created
            ON todo_item (created_at);
            """
        )

        # 5. Initiale Statusâ€‘EintrÃ¤ge (nur einfÃ¼gen, wenn sie noch nicht existieren)
        cur.execute("SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM status;")
        if cur.fetchone()["cnt"] == 0:
            cur.executemany(
                "INSERT INTO status (name, description) VALUES (?, ?);",
                [
                    ("Offen", "Aufgabe wurde noch nicht bearbeitet"),
                    ("In Bearbeitung", "Arbeit lÃ¤uft gerade"),
                    ("Erledigt", "Aufgabe ist abgeschlossen"),
                ],
            )
        self.conn.commit()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Statusâ€‘Hilfsfunktionen
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def get_statuses(self) -> List[Tuple[int, str]]:
        """Liefert eine Liste von (id, name) fÃ¼r alle definierten Stati."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute("SELECT id, name FROM status ORDER BY id;")
        return [(row["id"], row["name"]) for row in cur.fetchall()]

    def get_status_id_by_name(self, name: str) -> int:
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute("SELECT id FROM status WHERE name = ?;", (name,))
        row = cur.fetchone()
        if row is None:
            raise ValueError(f"Status '{name}' existiert nicht.")
        return row["id"]

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Todoâ€‘Itemâ€‘Operationen
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def add_item(
        self,
        name: str,
        description: str,
        item_type: str,
        status_name: str = "Offen",
    ) -> int:
        """FÃ¼gt ein neues Todoâ€‘Item ein und gibt die erzeugte NR zurÃ¼ck."""
        if item_type not in ("bug", "idee"):
            raise ValueError("item_type muss 'bug' oder 'idee' sein.")
        status_id = self.get_status_id_by_name(status_name)
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            INSERT INTO todo_item (name, description, type, status_id)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
            """,
            (name, description, item_type, status_id),
        )
        self.conn.commit()
        return cur.lastrowid

    def get_all_items(self) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """Liefert alle Todoâ€‘Items als Liste von Dictionaries."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            SELECT ti.nr, ti.name, ti.description, ti.type,
                   s.name AS status,
                   ti.created_at, ti.updated_at
            FROM todo_item ti
            JOIN status s ON ti.status_id = s.id
            ORDER BY ti.nr ASC;
            """
        )
        rows = cur.fetchall()
        return [dict(row) for row in rows]

    def update_item(
        self,
        nr: int,
        name: str,
        description: str,
        item_type: str,
        status_name: str,
    ) -> None:
        """Aktualisiert sÃ¤mtliche Felder eines bestehenden Items."""
        if item_type not in ("bug", "idee"):
            raise ValueError("item_type muss 'bug' oder 'idee' sein.")
        status_id = self.get_status_id_by_name(status_name)
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            UPDATE todo_item
            SET name = ?, description = ?, type = ?, status_id = ?
            WHERE nr = ?;
            """,
            (name, description, item_type, status_id, nr),
        )
        self.conn.commit()

    def delete_item(self, nr: int) -> None:
        """LÃ¶scht ein Todoâ€‘Item."""
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute("DELETE FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (nr,))
        self.conn.commit()

    def change_status(self, nr: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
        """Ã„ndert nur den Status eines Items."""
        status_id = self.get_status_id_by_name(new_status_name)
        cur = self.conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            "UPDATE todo_item SET status_id = ? WHERE nr = ?;",
            (status_id, nr),
        )
        self.conn.commit()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  AufrÃ¤umen
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def close(self) -> None:
        self.conn.close()
```

```python
"""
dialogs.py â€“ Dialoge fÃ¼r das Anlegen / Bearbeiten von Todoâ€‘Items
"""

from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QDialog,
    QVBoxLayout,
    QFormLayout,
    QLineEdit,
    QTextEdit,
    QComboBox,
    QPushButton,
    QMessageBox,
)
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt


class AddEditDialog(QDialog):
    """
    Wiederverwendbarer Dialog zum Anlegen oder Bearbeiten eines Todoâ€‘Items.
    Der Dialog arbeitet im Modus 'add' bzw. 'edit' (je nach Ã¼bergebenem item).
    """

    def __init__(self, db, item: dict | None = None, parent=None):
        """
        :param db: Instanz von db.Database
        :param item: Optionales Dict mit den Feldern eines bestehenden Items
        :param parent: Parentâ€‘Widget
        """
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.db = db
        self.item = item
        self.setWindowTitle("Eintrag hinzufÃ¼gen" if item is None else "Eintrag bearbeiten")
        self.setModal(True)
        self.setAttribute(Qt.WA_DeleteOnClose)

        self._build_ui()
        if self.item:
            self._populate_fields()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  UIâ€‘Aufbau
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _build_ui(self):
        layout = QVBoxLayout(self)

        form = QFormLayout()
        self.name_edit = QLineEdit()
        self.desc_edit = QTextEdit()
        self.type_combo = QComboBox()
        self.type_combo.addItems(["bug", "idee"])
        self.status_combo = QComboBox()
        self.status_combo.addItems([name for _, name in self.db.get_statuses()])

        form.addRow("Name:", self.name_edit)
        form.addRow("Beschreibung:", self.desc_edit)
        form.addRow("Typ:", self.type_combo)
        form.addRow("Status:", self.status_combo)

        layout.addLayout(form)

        # Buttons
        btn_layout = QVBoxLayout()
        self.save_btn = QPushButton("Speichern")
        self.cancel_btn = QPushButton("Abbrechen")
        self.save_btn.clicked.connect(self._on_save)
        self.cancel_btn.clicked.connect(self.reject)

        btn_layout.addWidget(self.save_btn)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.cancel_btn)
        layout.addLayout(btn_layout)

        # Stil â€“ leicht transparent fÃ¼r den Glassâ€‘Effekt
        self.setStyleSheet(
            """
            QDialog {
                background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);
                border-radius: 12px;
                padding: 15px;
            }
            QLineEdit, QTextEdit, QComboBox {
                background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6);
                border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
                border-radius: 6px;
                padding: 4px;
            }
            QPushButton {
                background-color: rgba(0, 120, 215, 0.7);
                color: white;
                border: none;
                border-radius: 6px;
                padding: 6px 12px;
            }
            QPushButton:hover {
                background-color: rgba(0, 120, 215, 0.9);
            }
            """
        )

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Daten fÃ¼llen (Editâ€‘Modus)
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _populate_fields(self):
        self.name_edit.setText(self.item["name"])
        self.desc_edit.setPlainText(self.item["description"] or "")
        self.type_combo.setCurrentText(self.item["type"])
        self.status_combo.setCurrentText(self.item["status"])

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Validierung & Speichern
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _on_save(self):
        name = self.name_edit.text().strip()
        description = self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip()
        item_type = self.type_combo.currentText()
        status = self.status_combo.currentText()

        if not name:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Eingabefehler", "Der Name darf nicht leer sein.")
            return

        try:
            if self.item is None:
                # Neu anlegen
                self.db.add_item(name, description, item_type, status)
            else:
                # Vorhandenes Item aktualisieren
                self.db.update_item(
                    self.item["nr"], name, description, item_type, status
                )
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Datenbankfehler", str(e))
            return

        self.accept()
```

```python
        item = self.items[selected]

        menu.exec_(self.table.mapToGlobal(pos))
```

```python
import sqlite3
import threading
import os
from typing import List, Tuple, Dict


class Database:
    """
    Threadâ€‘safe singleton wrapper around a SQLite connection.
    All public methods acquire an internal lock before touching the DB,
    eliminating raceâ€‘conditions without using ``check_same_thread=False``.
    """
    _instance = None
    _instance_lock = threading.Lock()

    def __new__(cls, db_path: str = "todo.db"):
        if cls._instance is None:
            with cls._instance_lock:
                if cls._instance is None:
                    cls._instance = super(Database, cls).__new__(cls)
                    cls._instance._init(db_path)
        return cls._instance

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Internal initialisation
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _init(self, db_path: str):
        self.db_path = db_path
        # No ``check_same_thread=False`` â€“ we keep the default (True) and
        # protect every operation with a lock.
        self.conn = sqlite3.connect(self.db_path, detect_types=sqlite3.PARSE_DECLTYPES)
        self.conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
        self._conn_lock = threading.Lock()
        self._create_tables()
        self._ensure_default_statuses()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Lowâ€‘level helpers
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _execute(self, query: str, params: Tuple = (), commit: bool = False) -> sqlite3.Cursor:
        """Execute a query in a threadâ€‘safe manner."""
        with self._conn_lock:
            cur = self.conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(query, params)
            if commit:
                self.conn.commit()
            return cur

    def _create_tables(self):
        self._execute(
            """CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
                id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                description TEXT
            );""",
            commit=True,
        )
        self._execute(
            """CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS todo_item (
                nr INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                name TEXT NOT NULL,
                description TEXT,
                type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')),
                status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id)
                    ON UPDATE CASCADE
                    ON DELETE RESTRICT
            );""",
            commit=True,
        )
        self._execute(
            """CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS trg_todo_item_updated
            AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
            FOR EACH ROW
            BEGIN
                UPDATE todo_item SET updated_at = datetime('now') WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
            END;""",
            commit=True,
        )
        self._execute(
            """CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_status_type
            ON todo_item (status_id, type);""",
            commit=True,
        )
        self._execute(
            """CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_created
            ON todo_item (created_at);""",
            commit=True,
        )

    def _ensure_default_statuses(self):
        cur = self._execute("SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM status;")
        if cur.fetchone()["cnt"] == 0:
            self._execute(
                """INSERT INTO status (name, description) VALUES
                    ('Offen', 'Aufgabe wurde noch nicht bearbeitet'),
                    ('In Bearbeitung', 'Arbeit lÃ¤uft gerade'),
                    ('Erledigt', 'Aufgabe ist abgeschlossen');""",
                commit=True,
            )

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Public API
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def add_item(self, name: str, description: str, type_: str) -> None:
        """Insert a new bug/idea with the default status 'Offen'."""
        cur = self._execute("SELECT id FROM status WHERE name='Offen';")
        status_id = cur.fetchone()["id"]
        self._execute(
            """INSERT INTO todo_item (name, description, type, status_id)
               VALUES (?,?,?,?);""",
            (name, description, type_, status_id),
            commit=True,
        )

    def get_all_items(self) -> List[Dict]:
        """Return a list of all todo items with resolved status names."""
        cur = self._execute(
            """SELECT ti.nr, ti.name, ti.description, ti.type,
                      s.name AS status, ti.created_at, ti.updated_at
               FROM todo_item ti
               JOIN status s ON ti.status_id = s.id
               ORDER BY ti.created_at DESC;"""
        )
        return [dict(row) for row in cur.fetchall()]

    def get_statuses(self) -> List[Tuple[int, str]]:
        """Return all available statuses as (id, name)."""
        cur = self._execute("SELECT id, name FROM status;")
        return [(row["id"], row["name"]) for row in cur.fetchall()]

    def update_status(self, nr: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
        """Change the status of a todo item identified by its NR."""
        cur = self._execute("SELECT id FROM status WHERE name=?;", (new_status_name,))
        row = cur.fetchone()
        if not row:
            raise ValueError(f"Status '{new_status_name}' does not exist")
        status_id = row["id"]
        self._execute(
            "UPDATE todo_item SET status_id=? WHERE nr=?;",
            (status_id, nr),
            commit=True,
        )
```

```python
import os
import sqlite3
from typing import List, Dict, Optional

DB_PATH = os.path.join(os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__)), "todo.db")


class TodoDB:
    """Singletonâ€‘like helper for all SQLiteâ€‘Operationen."""

    def __init__(self, db_path: str = DB_PATH):
        self.db_path = db_path
        self._ensure_db()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Private helpers
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _connect(self) -> sqlite3.Connection:
        """Create a new connection (singleâ€‘threaded â€“ safe for a desktop app)."""
        return sqlite3.connect(self.db_path)

    def _ensure_db(self) -> None:
        """Create tables + default statusâ€‘EintrÃ¤ge, wenn sie noch nicht existieren."""
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            # 1. status table
            cur.execute(
                """
                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                    description TEXT
                );
                """
            )
            # 2. todo_item table
            cur.execute(
                """
                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS todo_item (
                    nr INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    name TEXT NOT NULL,
                    description TEXT,
                    type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')),
                    status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                    created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                    updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                    FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id)
                        ON UPDATE CASCADE
                        ON DELETE RESTRICT
                );
                """
            )
            # 3. Trigger fÃ¼r updated_at
            cur.execute(
                """
                CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS trg_todo_item_updated
                AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
                FOR EACH ROW
                BEGIN
                    UPDATE todo_item
                       SET updated_at = datetime('now')
                     WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
                END;
                """
            )
            # 4. Indexe
            cur.execute(
                "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_status_type ON todo_item (status_id, type);"
            )
            cur.execute(
                "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_created ON todo_item (created_at);"
            )
            # Default statusâ€‘EintrÃ¤ge
            cur.executemany(
                """
                INSERT OR IGNORE INTO status (name, description) VALUES (?, ?);
                """,
                [
                    ("Offen", "Aufgabe wurde noch nicht bearbeitet"),
                    ("In Bearbeitung", "Arbeit lÃ¤uft gerade"),
                    ("Erledigt", "Aufgabe ist abgeschlossen"),
                ],
            )
            conn.commit()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Public API
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def get_status_id(self, name: str) -> Optional[int]:
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute("SELECT id FROM status WHERE name = ?;", (name,))
            row = cur.fetchone()
            return row[0] if row else None

    def get_status_name(self, status_id: int) -> Optional[str]:
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute("SELECT name FROM status WHERE id = ?;", (status_id,))
            row = cur.fetchone()
            return row[0] if row else None

    def add_item(self, name: str, description: str, type_: str) -> int:
        if not name.strip():
            raise ValueError("Name darf nicht leer sein")
        if type_ not in ("bug", "idee"):
            raise ValueError("type muss 'bug' oder 'idee' sein")
        status_id = self.get_status_id("Offen")
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(
                """
                INSERT INTO todo_item (name, description, type, status_id)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
                """,
                (name, description, type_, status_id),
            )
            conn.commit()
            return cur.lastrowid

    def get_all_items(self) -> List[Dict]:
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(
                """
                SELECT ti.nr, ti.name, ti.description, ti.type,
                       s.name AS status, ti.created_at, ti.updated_at
                FROM todo_item ti
                JOIN status s ON ti.status_id = s.id
                ORDER BY ti.created_at DESC;
                """
            )
            rows = cur.fetchall()
            columns = [desc[0] for desc in cur.description]
            return [dict(zip(columns, row)) for row in rows]

    def update_status(self, nr: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
        status_id = self.get_status_id(new_status_name)
        if status_id is None:
            raise ValueError(f"Unbekannter Status: {new_status_name}")
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(
                "UPDATE todo_item SET status_id = ? WHERE nr = ?;",
                (status_id, nr),
            )
            if cur.rowcount == 0:
                raise ValueError(f"Todoâ€‘Item mit NR={nr} nicht gefunden")
            conn.commit()

    def delete_item(self, nr: int) -> None:
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute("DELETE FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (nr,))
            if cur.rowcount == 0:
                raise ValueError(f"Todoâ€‘Item mit NR={nr} nicht gefunden")
            conn.commit()
```

```python
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QDialog,
    QVBoxLayout,
    QFormLayout,
    QLineEdit,
    QTextEdit,
    QComboBox,
    QPushButton,
    QMessageBox,
)

class AddItemDialog(QDialog):
    """Dialog zum Anlegen eines neuen Bugs oder einer Idee."""

    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle("Neues Todoâ€‘Item")
        self.setMinimumWidth(400)
        self._setup_ui()

    def _setup_ui(self):
        layout = QVBoxLayout(self)

        form = QFormLayout()
        self.name_edit = QLineEdit()
        self.desc_edit = QTextEdit()
        self.type_combo = QComboBox()
        self.type_combo.addItems(["bug", "idee"])

        form.addRow("Titel:", self.name_edit)
        form.addRow("Beschreibung:", self.desc_edit)
        form.addRow("Typ:", self.type_combo)

        layout.addLayout(form)

        btn_box = QVBoxLayout()
        self.save_btn = QPushButton("Speichern")
        self.cancel_btn = QPushButton("Abbrechen")
        btn_box.addWidget(self.save_btn)
        btn_box.addWidget(self.cancel_btn)
        layout.addLayout(btn_box)

        self.save_btn.clicked.connect(self.accept)
        self.cancel_btn.clicked.connect(self.reject)

    def get_data(self):
        """RÃ¼ckgabeâ€‘Tuple (name, description, type)."""
        return (
            self.name_edit.text().strip(),
            self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip(),
            self.type_combo.currentText(),
        )

    def accept(self):
        name, _, _ = self.get_data()
        if not name:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "UngÃ¼ltig", "Der Titel darf nicht leer sein.")
            return
        super().accept()
```

### FILENAME: main.py
```python
import sys
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QApplication,
    QMainWindow,
    QWidget,
    QVBoxLayout,
    QHBoxLayout,
    QPushButton,
    QTableWidget,
    QTableWidgetItem,
    QMessageBox,
    QHeaderView,
    QComboBox,
)
from PyQt5.QtGui import QFont, QPalette, QColor
from PyQt5.QtCore import Qt
from db import TodoDB
from dialogs import AddItemDialog

class GlassMorphicWindow(QMainWindow):
    """Hauptfenster mit einem simplen Glassâ€‘Morphismâ€‘Look."""

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.setWindowTitle("ðŸªŸ Todoâ€‘Liste â€“ Bugs & Ideen")
        self.resize(900, 600)
        self.db = TodoDB()
        self._setup_ui()
        self._load_items()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  UI Aufbau
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _setup_ui(self):
        central = QWidget()
        self.setCentralWidget(central)

        # Glassâ€‘Morphism Style (halbtransparent, leichter Schatten)
        central.setStyleSheet(
            """
            QWidget {
                background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
                border-radius: 12px;
                backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
            }
            QTableWidget {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.25);
                border: none;
                gridline-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            }
            QHeaderView::section {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
                padding: 4px;
                border: none;
            }
            QPushButton {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
                border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
                border-radius: 6px;
                padding: 6px 12px;
            }
            QPushButton:hover {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.35);
            }
            """
        )

        layout = QVBoxLayout(central)

        # Toolbar
        toolbar = QHBoxLayout()
        self.add_bug_btn = QPushButton("ðŸª² Bug hinzufÃ¼gen")
        self.add_idea_btn = QPushButton("ðŸ’¡ Idee hinzufÃ¼gen")
        self.refresh_btn = QPushButton("ðŸ”„ Aktualisieren")
        toolbar.addWidget(self.add_bug_btn)
        toolbar.addWidget(self.add_idea_btn)
        toolbar.addStretch()
        toolbar.addWidget(self.refresh_btn)
        layout.addLayout(toolbar)

        # Tabelle
        self.table = QTableWidget(0, 5)
        self.table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(
            ["NR", "Titel", "Beschreibung", "Typ", "Status"]
        )
        self.table.horizontalHeader().setSectionResizeMode(QHeaderView.Stretch)
        self.table.setSelectionBehavior(QTableWidget.SelectRows)
        self.table.setEditTriggers(QTableWidget.NoEditTriggers)
        layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Statusâ€‘Ã„nderung
        status_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.status_combo = QComboBox()
        self.status_combo.addItems(["Offen", "In Bearbeitung", "Erledigt"])
        self.change_status_btn = QPushButton("Status Ã¤ndern")
        status_layout.addWidget(self.status_combo)
        status_layout.addWidget(self.change_status_btn)
        layout.addLayout(status_layout)

        # Verbindungen
        self.add_bug_btn.clicked.connect(lambda: self._open_add_dialog("bug"))
        self.add_idea_btn.clicked.connect(lambda: self._open_add_dialog("idee"))
        self.refresh_btn.clicked.connect(self._load_items)
        self.change_status_btn.clicked.connect(self._change_status)

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Datenâ€‘Handling
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _load_items(self):
        self.table.setRowCount(0)
        items = self.db.get_all_items()
        for item in items:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem(str(item["nr"])))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(item["name"]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(item["description"] or ""))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(item["type"]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 4, QTableWidgetItem(item["status"]))

    def _open_add_dialog(self, forced_type: str):
        dlg = AddItemDialog(self)
        # preâ€‘select forced type
        idx = dlg.type_combo.findText(forced_type)
        if idx >= 0:
            dlg.type_combo.setCurrentIndex(idx)
        if dlg.exec_() == QDialog.Accepted:
            name, description, type_ = dlg.get_data()
            try:
                self.db.add_item(name, description, type_)
                self._load_items()
            except Exception as e:
                QMessageBox.critical(self, "Fehler", str(e))

    def _change_status(self):
        selected = self.table.selectedItems()
        if not selected:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Hinweis", "Bitte ein Item auswÃ¤hlen.")
            return
        nr_item = selected[0]  # erste Spalte = NR
        nr = int(nr_item.text())
        new_status = self.status_combo.currentText()
        try:
            self.db.update_status(nr, new_status)
            self._load_items()
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Fehler", str(e))


def main():
    app = QApplication(sys.argv)

    # Optional: dunkles Theme fÃ¼r besseren Glassâ€‘Look
    palette = QPalette()
    palette.setColor(QPalette.Window, QColor(30, 30, 30, 200))
    palette.setColor(QPalette.Base, QColor(0, 0, 0, 0))
    app.setPalette(palette)

    win = GlassMorphicWindow()
    win.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

```python
import os
import sqlite3
import pytest
from db import TodoDB, DB_PATH

# --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
#  Hilfsâ€‘Fixture: temporÃ¤re Datenbank fÃ¼r jeden Test
# --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
@pytest.fixture
def fresh_db(tmp_path):
    test_db_path = os.path.join(tmp_path, "test_todo.db")
    # Kopiere das Schema in eine neue DB
    db = TodoDB(db_path=test_db_path)
    yield db
    # AufrÃ¤umen
    if os.path.exists(test_db_path):
        os.remove(test_db_path)


# --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
#  Testâ€‘Cases
# --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
def test_init_creates_statuses(fresh_db):
    """Die Standardâ€‘Statusâ€‘EintrÃ¤ge mÃ¼ssen nach dem Init vorhanden sein."""
    statuses = ["Offen", "In Bearbeitung", "Erledigt"]
    for name in statuses:
        assert fresh_db.get_status_id(name) is not None


def test_add_and_retrieve_item(fresh_db):
    """Ein hinzugefÃ¼gtes Item muss wieder abrufbar sein."""
    nr = fresh_db.add_item("Test Bug", "Beschreibung", "bug")
    items = fresh_db.get_all_items()
    assert any(item["nr"] == nr and item["name"] == "Test Bug" for item in items)


def test_update_status_success(fresh_db):
    nr = fresh_db.add_item("Idee 1", "Beschreibung", "idee")
    fresh_db.update_status(nr, "Erledigt")
    items = fresh_db.get_all_items()
    matching = [i for i in items if i["nr"] == nr]
    assert matching and matching[0]["status"] == "Erledigt"


def test_update_status_invalid_status_raises(fresh_db):
    nr = fresh_db.add_item("Bug X", "", "bug")
    with pytest.raises(ValueError) as exc:
        fresh_db.update_status(nr, "Unbekannt")
    assert "Unbekannter Status" in str(exc.value)


def test_add_item_invalid_type_raises(fresh_db):
    with pytest.raises(ValueError) as exc:
        fresh_db.add_item("Name", "Desc", "invalid_type")
    assert "type muss" in str(exc.value)


def test_add_item_empty_name_raises(fresh_db):
    with pytest.raises(ValueError):
        fresh_db.add_item("", "Desc", "bug")
```

```python
import os
import sqlite3
from typing import List, Dict, Optional

# Absolute path to the SQLite database file
DB_PATH = os.path.join(os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__)), "todo.db")


class TodoDB:
    """Helper class that encapsulates all SQLite operations."""

    def __init__(self, db_path: str = DB_PATH):
        self.db_path = db_path
        self._ensure_db()

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Private helpers
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _connect(self) -> sqlite3.Connection:
        """Create a new connection (singleâ€‘threaded â€“ safe for a desktop app)."""
        return sqlite3.connect(self.db_path)

    def _ensure_db(self) -> None:
        """Create tables, triggers, indexes and default status rows if they do not exist."""
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            #  1. status table
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            cur.execute(
                """
                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
                    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
                    description TEXT
                );
                """
            )
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            #  2. todo_item table
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            cur.execute(
                """
                CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS todo_item (
                    nr INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
                    name TEXT NOT NULL,
                    description TEXT,
                    type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')),
                    status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
                    created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                    updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
                    FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id)
                        ON UPDATE CASCADE
                        ON DELETE RESTRICT
                );
                """
            )
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            #  3. Trigger to keep updated_at current
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            cur.execute(
                """
                CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS trg_todo_item_updated
                AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
                FOR EACH ROW
                BEGIN
                    UPDATE todo_item
                       SET updated_at = datetime('now')
                     WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
                END;
                """
            )
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            #  4. Indexes for fast lookâ€‘ups
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            cur.execute(
                "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_status_type ON todo_item (status_id, type);"
            )
            cur.execute(
                "CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_created ON todo_item (created_at);"
            )
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            #  5. Default status entries
            # -----------------------------------------------------------------
            cur.executemany(
                """
                INSERT OR IGNORE INTO status (name, description) VALUES (?, ?);
                """,
                [
                    ("Offen", "Aufgabe wurde noch nicht bearbeitet"),
                    ("In Bearbeitung", "Arbeit lÃ¤uft gerade"),
                    ("Erledigt", "Aufgabe ist abgeschlossen"),
                ],
            )
            conn.commit()

        # -----------------------------------------------------------------
        #  6. Restrict file permissions (UNIX only) â€“ security task SECâ€‘003
        # -----------------------------------------------------------------
        if os.name != "nt":  # Windows does not support chmod the same way
            try:
                os.chmod(self.db_path, 0o600)
            except Exception:
                pass  # Silently ignore if chmod fails (e.g., on readâ€‘only FS)

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Public API
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def get_status_id(self, name: str) -> Optional[int]:
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute("SELECT id FROM status WHERE name = ?;", (name,))
            row = cur.fetchone()
            return row[0] if row else None

    def get_status_name(self, status_id: int) -> Optional[str]:
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute("SELECT name FROM status WHERE id = ?;", (status_id,))
            row = cur.fetchone()
            return row[0] if row else None

    def add_item(self, name: str, description: str, type_: str) -> int:
        """Insert a new todoâ€‘item and return its primary key (nr)."""
        if not name.strip():
            raise ValueError("Name darf nicht leer sein")
        if type_ not in ("bug", "idee"):
            raise ValueError("type muss 'bug' oder 'idee' sein")
        status_id = self.get_status_id("Offen")
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(
                """
                INSERT INTO todo_item (name, description, type, status_id)
                VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
                """,
                (name, description, type_, status_id),
            )
            conn.commit()
            return cur.lastrowid

    def get_all_items(self) -> List[Dict]:
        """Return a list of dicts representing every todoâ€‘item."""
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(
                """
                SELECT ti.nr, ti.name, ti.description, ti.type,
                       s.name AS status, ti.created_at, ti.updated_at
                FROM todo_item ti
                JOIN status s ON ti.status_id = s.id
                ORDER BY ti.created_at DESC;
                """
            )
            rows = cur.fetchall()
            columns = [desc[0] for desc in cur.description]
            return [dict(zip(columns, row)) for row in rows]

    def update_status(self, nr: int, new_status_name: str) -> None:
        """Change the status of a given item."""
        status_id = self.get_status_id(new_status_name)
        if status_id is None:
            raise ValueError(f"Unbekannter Status: {new_status_name}")
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute(
                "UPDATE todo_item SET status_id = ? WHERE nr = ?;",
                (status_id, nr),
            )
            if cur.rowcount == 0:
                raise ValueError(f"Todoâ€‘Item mit NR={nr} nicht gefunden")
            conn.commit()

    def delete_item(self, nr: int) -> None:
        """Remove an item permanently."""
        with self._connect() as conn:
            cur = conn.cursor()
            cur.execute("DELETE FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (nr,))
            if cur.rowcount == 0:
                raise ValueError(f"Todoâ€‘Item mit NR={nr} nicht gefunden")
            conn.commit()
```

```python
from dataclasses import dataclass, field
from datetime import datetime
from typing import ClassVar, Tuple


@dataclass
class Status:
    """Simple representation of a status entry."""
    id: int
    name: str
    description: str = ""

    # Preâ€‘defined status names â€“ kept in sync with the DB defaults
    VALID_NAMES: ClassVar[Tuple[str, ...]] = ("Offen", "In Bearbeitung", "Erledigt")

    def __post_init__(self) -> None:
        if self.name not in self.VALID_NAMES:
            raise ValueError(f"UngÃ¼ltiger Statusâ€‘Name: {self.name}")


@dataclass
class TodoItem:
    """Dataclass mir den Feldern, die in der SQLiteâ€‘Tabelle definiert sind."""
    nr: int = field(init=False)  # wird von SQLite vergeben
    name: str
    description: str = ""
    type: str = field(default="bug")  # 'bug' oder 'idee'
    status: Status = field(default_factory=lambda: Status(0, "Offen"))
    created_at: str = field(default_factory=lambda: datetime.now().isoformat())
    updated_at: str = field(default_factory=lambda: datetime.now().isoformat())

    VALID_TYPES: ClassVar[Tuple[str, ...]] = ("bug", "idee")

    def __post_init__(self) -> None:
        if not self.name.strip():
            raise ValueError("Titel darf nicht leer sein")
        if self.type not in self.VALID_TYPES:
            raise ValueError(f"UngÃ¼ltiger Typ: {self.type}")
        if not isinstance(self.status, Status):
            raise TypeError("status muss ein Statusâ€‘Objekt sein")
```

```python
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import (
    QDialog,
    QVBoxLayout,
    QFormLayout,
    QLineEdit,
    QTextEdit,
    QComboBox,
    QPushButton,
    QMessageBox,
)


class AddItemDialog(QDialog):
    """Dialog zum Anlegen eines neuen Bugs oder einer Idee."""

    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle("Neues Todoâ€‘Item")
        self.setMinimumWidth(400)
        self._setup_ui()

    def _setup_ui(self):
        layout = QVBoxLayout(self)

        form = QFormLayout()
        self.name_edit = QLineEdit()
        self.desc_edit = QTextEdit()
        self.type_combo = QComboBox()
        self.type_combo.addItems(["bug", "idee"])

        form.addRow("Titel:", self.name_edit)
        form.addRow("Beschreibung:", self.desc_edit)
        form.addRow("Typ:", self.type_combo)

        layout.addLayout(form)

        btn_box = QVBoxLayout()
        self.save_btn = QPushButton("Speichern")
        self.cancel_btn = QPushButton("Abbrechen")
        btn_box.addWidget(self.save_btn)
        btn_box.addWidget(self.cancel_btn)
        layout.addLayout(btn_box)

        self.save_btn.clicked.connect(self.accept)
        self.cancel_btn.clicked.connect(self.reject)

    def get_data(self):
        """Return a tuple (name, description, type)."""
        return (
            self.name_edit.text().strip(),
            self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip(),
            self.type_combo.currentText(),
        )

    def accept(self):
        name, _, _ = self.get_data()
        if not name:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "UngÃ¼ltig", "Der Titel darf nicht leer sein.")
            return
        super().accept()
```

        central.setStyleSheet(

            QWidget {
                background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
                border-radius: 12px;
                backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
            }
            QTableWidget {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.25);
                border: none;
                gridline-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
            }
            QHeaderView::section {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
                padding: 4px;
                border: none;
            }
            QPushButton {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
                border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.4);
                border-radius: 6px;
                padding: 6px 12px;
            }
            QPushButton:hover {
                background: rgba(255,255,255,0.35);
            }
            """
        )

        layout = QVBoxLayout(central)

        # Toolbar
        toolbar = QHBoxLayout()
        self.add_bug_btn = QPushButton("ðŸª² Bug hinzufÃ¼gen")
        self.add_idea_btn = QPushButton("ðŸ’¡ Idee hinzufÃ¼gen")
        self.refresh_btn = QPushButton("ðŸ”„ Aktualisieren")
        toolbar.addWidget(self.add_bug_btn)
        toolbar.addWidget(self.add_idea_btn)
        toolbar.addStretch()
        toolbar.addWidget(self.refresh_btn)
        layout.addLayout(toolbar)

        # Tabelle
        self.table = QTableWidget(0, 5)
        self.table.setHorizontalHeaderLabels(
            ["NR", "Titel", "Beschreibung", "Typ", "Status"]
        )
        self.table.horizontalHeader().setSectionResizeMode(QHeaderView.Stretch)
        self.table.setSelectionBehavior(QTableWidget.SelectRows)
        self.table.setEditTriggers(QTableWidget.NoEditTriggers)
        layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Statusâ€‘Ã„nderung
        status_layout = QHBoxLayout()
        self.status_combo = QComboBox()
        self.status_combo.addItems(["Offen", "In Bearbeitung", "Erledigt"])
        self.change_status_btn = QPushButton("Status Ã¤ndern")
        status_layout.addWidget(self.status_combo)
        status_layout.addWidget(self.change_status_btn)
        layout.addLayout(status_layout)

        # Verbindungen
        self.add_bug_btn.clicked.connect(lambda: self._open_add_dialog("bug"))
        self.add_idea_btn.clicked.connect(lambda: self._open_add_dialog("idee"))
        self.refresh_btn.clicked.connect(self._load_items)
        self.change_status_btn.clicked.connect(self._change_status)

    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    #  Datenâ€‘Handling
    # --------------------------------------------------------------------- #
    def _load_items(self):
        self.table.setRowCount(0)
        items = self.db.get_all_items()
        for item in items:
            row = self.table.rowCount()
            self.table.insertRow(row)
            self.table.setItem(row, 0, QTableWidgetItem(str(item["nr"])))
            self.table.setItem(row, 1, QTableWidgetItem(item["name"]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 2, QTableWidgetItem(item["description"] or ""))
            self.table.setItem(row, 3, QTableWidgetItem(item["type"]))
            self.table.setItem(row, 4, QTableWidgetItem(item["status"]))

    def _open_add_dialog(self, forced_type: str):
        dlg = AddItemDialog(self)
        idx = dlg.type_combo.findText(forced_type)
        if idx >= 0:
            dlg.type_combo.setCurrentIndex(idx)
        if dlg.exec_() == QDialog.Accepted:
            name, description, type_ = dlg.get_data()
            try:
                self.db.add_item(name, description, type_)
                self._load_items()
            except Exception as e:
                QMessageBox.critical(self, "Fehler", str(e))

    def _change_status(self):
        selected = self.table.selectedItems()
        if not selected:
            QMessageBox.warning(self, "Hinweis", "Bitte ein Item auswÃ¤hlen.")
            return
        nr_item = selected[0]  # erste Spalte = NR
        nr = int(nr_item.text())
        new_status = self.status_combo.currentText()
        try:
            self.db.update_status(nr, new_status)
            self._load_items()
        except Exception as e:
            QMessageBox.critical(self, "Fehler", str(e))

### FILENAME: db.py
import os
import sqlite3
from pathlib import Path

DB_NAME = "todo.db"
DB_PATH = Path(__file__).parent / DB_NAME

def get_connection():
    """Return a new SQLite connection with foreignâ€‘keys enabled."""
    conn = sqlite3.connect(DB_PATH)
    conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
    conn.execute("PRAGMA foreign_keys = ON;")
    return conn

def init_db():
    """Create the database schema if it does not exist."""
    if not DB_PATH.exists():
        # create empty file first so we can set permissions afterwards
        DB_PATH.touch()
        # Restrict permissions (UNIX only; on Windows this is a noâ€‘op)
        try:
            os.chmod(DB_PATH, 0o600)
        except PermissionError:
            pass  # Windows does not support chmod in the same way

    conn = get_connection()
    cur = conn.cursor()

    # ---- status table -------------------------------------------------
    cur.execute("""
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS status (
            id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
            description TEXT
        );
    """)

    # ---- todo_item table -----------------------------------------------
    cur.execute("""
        CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS todo_item (
            nr INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
            name TEXT NOT NULL,
            description TEXT,
            type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (type IN ('bug','idee')),
            status_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
            created_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
            updated_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT (datetime('now')),
            FOREIGN KEY (status_id) REFERENCES status(id)
                ON UPDATE CASCADE
                ON DELETE RESTRICT
        );
    """)

    # ---- trigger for updated_at -----------------------------------------
    cur.execute("""
        CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS trg_todo_item_updated
        AFTER UPDATE ON todo_item
        FOR EACH ROW
        BEGIN
            UPDATE todo_item
               SET updated_at = datetime('now')
             WHERE nr = NEW.nr;
        END;
    """)

    # ---- indexes --------------------------------------------------------
    cur.execute("""
        CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_status_type
        ON todo_item (status_id, type);
    """)
    cur.execute("""
        CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_todo_item_created
        ON todo_item (created_at);
    """)

    # ---- default statuses ------------------------------------------------
    default_statuses = [
        ("Offen", "Aufgabe wurde noch nicht bearbeitet"),
        ("In Bearbeitung", "Arbeit lÃ¤uft gerade"),
        ("Erledigt", "Aufgabe ist abgeschlossen")
    ]
    for name, desc in default_statuses:
        cur.execute(
            "INSERT OR IGNORE INTO status (name, description) VALUES (?, ?);",
            (name, desc)
        )

    conn.commit()
    conn.close()

### FILENAME: models.py
import sqlite3
from typing import List, Optional, Tuple
from db import get_connection

class Status:
    """Simple dataâ€‘class representing a row in the `status` table."""
    def __init__(self, id_: int, name: str, description: Optional[str] = None):
        self.id = id_
        self.name = name
        self.description = description

    @staticmethod
    def all() -> List["Status"]:
        conn = get_connection()
        rows = conn.execute("SELECT id, name, description FROM status ORDER BY id;").fetchall()
        conn.close()
        return [Status(r["id"], r["name"], r["description"]) for r in rows]

    @staticmethod
    def get_by_name(name: str) -> Optional["Status"]:
        conn = get_connection()
        row = conn.execute(
            "SELECT id, name, description FROM status WHERE name = ?;",
            (name,)
        ).fetchone()
        conn.close()
        if row:
            return Status(row["id"], row["name"], row["description"])
        return None

    @staticmethod
    def get_by_id(id_: int) -> Optional["Status"]:
        conn = get_connection()
        row = conn.execute(
            "SELECT id, name, description FROM status WHERE id = ?;",
            (id_,)
        ).fetchone()
        conn.close()
        if row:
            return Status(row["id"], row["name"], row["description"])
        return None

class TodoItem:
    """Represents a single todo entry (bug or idea)."""
    def __init__(
        self,
        nr: int,
        name: str,
        description: Optional[str],
        type_: str,
        status_id: int,
        created_at: str,
        updated_at: str,
    ):
        self.nr = nr
        self.name = name
        self.description = description
        self.type = type_
        self.status_id = status_id
        self.created_at = created_at
        self.updated_at = updated_at

    @staticmethod
    def create(name: str, description: str, type_: str, status_name: str = "Offen") -> "TodoItem":
        """Insert a new todo item and return the created object."""
        if type_ not in ("bug", "idee"):
            raise ValueError("type must be either 'bug' or 'idee'")

        status = Status.get_by_name(status_name)
        if not status:
            raise ValueError(f"Status '{status_name}' does not exist")

        conn = get_connection()
        cur = conn.cursor()
        cur.execute(
            """
            INSERT INTO todo_item (name, description, type, status_id)
            VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?);
            """,
            (name, description, type_, status.id),
        )
        conn.commit()
        nr = cur.lastrowid
        row = conn.execute(
            "SELECT * FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (nr,)
        ).fetchone()
        conn.close()
        return TodoItem(
            nr=row["nr"],
            name=row["name"],
            description=row["description"],
            type_=row["type"],
            status_id=row["status_id"],
            created_at=row["created_at"],
            updated_at=row["updated_at"],
        )

    @staticmethod
    def get_all() -> List["TodoItem"]:
        conn = get_connection()
        rows = conn.execute(
            "SELECT * FROM todo_item ORDER BY created_at DESC;"
        ).fetchall()
        conn.close()
        return [
            TodoItem(
                nr=r["nr"],
                name=r["name"],
                description=r["description"],
                type_=r["type"],
                status_id=r["status_id"],
                created_at=r["created_at"],
                updated_at=r["updated_at"],
            )
            for r in rows
        ]

    @staticmethod
    def get_by_nr(nr: int) -> Optional["TodoItem"]:
        conn = get_connection()
        row = conn.execute(
            "SELECT * FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (nr,)
        ).fetchone()
        conn.close()
        if row:
            return TodoItem(
                nr=row["nr"],
                name=row["name"],
                description=row["description"],
                type_=row["type"],
                status_id=row["status_id"],
                created_at=row["created_at"],
                updated_at=row["updated_at"],
            )
        return None

    def update_status(self, new_status_name: str) -> None:
        """Change the status of this item."""
        status = Status.get_by_name(new_status_name)
        if not status:
            raise ValueError(f"Status '{new_status_name}' does not exist")
        conn = get_connection()
        conn.execute(
            "UPDATE todo_item SET status_id = ? WHERE nr = ?;",
            (status.id, self.nr),
        )
        conn.commit()
        conn.close()
        self.status_id = status.id

    def delete(self) -> None:
        conn = get_connection()
        conn.execute("DELETE FROM todo_item WHERE nr = ?;", (self.nr,))
        conn.commit()
        conn.close()

import sys
from pathlib import Path

from PyQt5 import QtCore, QtGui, QtWidgets

from db import init_db
from models import TodoItem, Status

# -------------------------------------------------
# Helper: Glassâ€‘morphism style sheet
# -------------------------------------------------
GLASS_STYLE = """
QWidget {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
    border-radius: 12px;
    color: #ffffff;
}
QTableView {
    background: transparent;
    gridline-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
}
QHeaderView::section {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
    padding: 4px;
    border: none;
}
QPushButton {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.25);
    border: none;
    padding: 6px 12px;
    border-radius: 8px;
}
QPushButton:hover {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.35);
}
"""

class AddDialog(QtWidgets.QDialog):
    """Dialog to add a new bug / idea."""
    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.setWindowTitle("Neuen Eintrag hinzufÃ¼gen")
        self.setModal(True)
        self.setStyleSheet(GLASS_STYLE)

        layout = QtWidgets.QFormLayout(self)

        self.name_edit = QtWidgets.QLineEdit()
        self.desc_edit = QtWidgets.QPlainTextEdit()
        self.type_combo = QtWidgets.QComboBox()
        self.type_combo.addItems(["bug", "idee"])

        layout.addRow("Titel:", self.name_edit)
        layout.addRow("Beschreibung:", self.desc_edit)
        layout.addRow("Typ:", self.type_combo)

        btn_box = QtWidgets.QDialogButtonBox(
            QtWidgets.QDialogButtonBox.Ok | QtWidgets.QDialogButtonBox.Cancel
        )
        btn_box.accepted.connect(self.accept)
        btn_box.rejected.connect(self.reject)
        layout.addRow(btn_box)

    def get_data(self) -> Tuple[str, str, str]:
        return (
            self.name_edit.text().strip(),
            self.desc_edit.toPlainText().strip(),
            self.type_combo.currentText(),
        )

class TodoModel(QtCore.QAbstractTableModel):
    HEADERS = ["NR", "Titel", "Beschreibung", "Typ", "Status", "Erstellt", "Aktualisiert"]

    def __init__(self, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.refresh()

    def refresh(self):
        self._items = TodoItem.get_all()
        self.layoutChanged.emit()

    def rowCount(self, parent=QtCore.QModelIndex()):
        return len(self._items)

    def columnCount(self, parent=QtCore.QModelIndex()):
        return len(self.HEADERS)

    def data(self, index, role=QtCore.Qt.DisplayRole):
        if not index.isValid():
            return None
        item = self._items[index.row()]
        col = index.column()

        if role == QtCore.Qt.DisplayRole:
            if col == 0:
                return str(item.nr)
            elif col == 1:
                return item.name
            elif col == 2:
                return item.description or ""
            elif col == 3:
                return item.type
            elif col == 4:
                status = Status.get_by_id(item.status_id)
                return status.name if status else "?"
            elif col == 5:
                return item.created_at
            elif col == 6:
                return item.updated_at
        return None

    def headerData(self, section, orientation, role=QtCore.Qt.DisplayRole):
        if orientation == QtCore.Qt.Horizontal and role == QtCore.Qt.DisplayRole:
            return self.HEADERS[section]
        return super().headerData(section, orientation, role)

class MainWindow(QtWidgets.QMainWindow):
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.setWindowTitle("Todoâ€‘Liste â€“ Bugs & Ideen")
        self.resize(900, 600)
        self.setStyleSheet(GLASS_STYLE)

        central = QtWidgets.QWidget()
        self.setCentralWidget(central)
        layout = QtWidgets.QVBoxLayout(central)

        # Table
        self.table = QtWidgets.QTableView()
        self.model = TodoModel()
        self.table.setModel(self.model)
        self.table.setSelectionBehavior(QtWidgets.QAbstractItemView.SelectRows)
        self.table.setSelectionMode(QtWidgets.QAbstractItemView.SingleSelection)
        self.table.horizontalHeader().setStretchLastSection(True)
        self.table.setAlternatingRowColors(True)
        self.table.setShowGrid(False)
        self.table.setWordWrap(True)
        self.table.setEditTriggers(QtWidgets.QAbstractItemView.NoEditTriggers)
        layout.addWidget(self.table)

        # Buttons
        btn_layout = QtWidgets.QHBoxLayout()
        self.add_btn = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Eintrag hinzufÃ¼gen")
        self.status_btn = QtWidgets.QPushButton("Status Ã¤ndern")
        self.del_btn = QtWidgets.QPushButton("LÃ¶schen")
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.add_btn)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.status_btn)
        btn_layout.addWidget(self.del_btn)
        layout.addLayout(btn_layout)

        # Connections
        self.add_btn.clicked.connect(self.add_item)
        self.status_btn.clicked.connect(self.change_status)
        self.del_btn.clicked.connect(self.delete_item)

    def add_item(self):
        dlg = AddDialog(self)
        if dlg.exec_() == QtWidgets.QDialog.Accepted:
            name, desc, type_ = dlg.get_data()
            if not name:
                QtWidgets.QMessageBox.warning(self, "Fehler", "Titel darf nicht leer sein.")
                return
            TodoItem.create(name, desc, type_)
            self.model.refresh()

    def change_status(self):
        indexes = self.table.selectionModel().selectedRows()
        if not indexes:
            QtWidgets.QMessageBox.information(self, "Hinweis", "Bitte zuerst einen Eintrag auswÃ¤hlen.")
            return
        row = indexes[0].row()
        item = self.model._items[row]

        status_names = [s.name for s in Status.all()]
        current_status = Status.get_by_id(item.status_id).name
        new_status, ok = QtWidgets.QInputDialog.getItem(
            self,
            "Status Ã¤ndern",
            f"Aktueller Status: {current_status}\nNeuen Status wÃ¤hlen:",
            status_names,
            editable=False,
        )
        if ok and new_status:
            item.update_status(new_status)
            self.model.refresh()

    def delete_item(self):
        indexes = self.table.selectionModel().selectedRows()
        if not indexes:
            QtWidgets.QMessageBox.information(self, "Hinweis", "Bitte zuerst einen Eintrag auswÃ¤hlen.")
            return
        row = indexes[0].row()
        item = self.model._items[row]
        confirm = QtWidgets.QMessageBox.question(
            self,
            "LÃ¶schen bestÃ¤tigen",
            f"Soll der Eintrag \"{item.name}\" wirklich gelÃ¶scht werden?",
        )
        if confirm == QtWidgets.QMessageBox.Yes:
            item.delete()
            self.model.refresh()

def main():
    init_db()
    app = QtWidgets.QApplication(sys.argv)
    # Enable translucency on Windows 10+ (optional)
    if sys.platform.startswith("win"):
        app.setAttribute(QtCore.Qt.AA_UseDesktopOpenGL)
    win = MainWindow()
    win.show()
    sys.exit(app.exec_())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
